text: penny Mack is the fourth largest

part of one of the most important

expands and contracts with interest
rates in our traditional data center
world we had a fixed cost floor that no
matter what the market conditions were
we had to absorb as an expense so it's
part of preparing for the cloud we've
decided that we're going to virtualize
pretty much our entire computing

go all-in it became apparent that there

really around our virtual desktops enter

ability to actually run some of the

virtual desktop environment within our
data
VMware on AWS allows us to do is apply
